Handle UnavailableResourceEvent in EMWorker

channels after connecting. Trying to solve it by checking if the resource is a
channel, and if it is, add a 30-second rejoin timer.

commit_list.message:
Add ability to compile ragel grammar -> C extension

* Modularized the .rl files to allow a shared grammar for both the C and Ruby parser.
* New rake tasks `rake compile_parser:ruby` and `rake compile_parser:c`
* C extension is optional - bot still uses the Ruby parser by default.

Added global variable $botdir for cleaner/easier require's

commit_list.message:
RSS Plugin: Added filter functionality

Feeds can now be filtered using regular expressions. The new commands are:
	- !rssfilter add <url or regexp> <filter-regexp>  -> adds a filter to the feed for the given URL (or feeds whose URL match given regexp)
	- !rssfilter del <url or regexp> <filter-regexp>  -> delete a filter from feed(s)
	- !rssfilter list [url or regexp]					  -> print all filters, or print filters for feed(s) matching the given URL/regexp

commit_list.message:
- rss.rb: RSS plugin added (needs cleanup, support for RSS 0.90)
- added 'commands' as a Plugin variable, so plugins can now add commands   to FBSDBot::Bot's @commands array. This also gives us !commands as a core command.
- added FBSDBot::format_string that will replace color codes (%r, %b, %g etc.) in a string with the appropriate color code for IRC. The Action class now use this method for all outgoing messages.

commit_list.message:
RSS Plugin: Added filter functionality

Feeds can now be filtered using regular expressions. The new commands are:
	- !rssfilter add <url or regexp> <filter-regexp>  -> adds a filter to the feed for the given URL (or feeds whose URL match given regexp)
	- !rssfilter del <url or regexp> <filter-regexp>  -> delete a filter from feed(s)
	- !rssfilter list [url or regexp]					  -> print all filters, or print filters for feed(s) matching the given URL/regexp
